items.name: German Pilsner
items.desc:
6 cans of German Pilsner.
A simple, dry, clean and clear refresher made with 100% German Pilsen malt and heaps of Hallertau Mittlefrüh hops.
24hr delivery service from your beers leaving the brewery, not from placing your order. Please ensure your delivery details are correct at checkout.
Orders placed after 2PM Thur will be dispatched the following week.

items.name: Unconventional Tactics DIPA
items.desc:
6 cans of Unconventional Tactics DIPA.
It’s no secret that Nelson Sauvin is our favourite hop. No secret at all. To this end…here is the most "Nelsony" beer we’ve ever attempted. We’ve added Nelson on top of Nelson, squeezed a bit more Nelson in, and then finished it off with some Nelson. Super smooth. Super light. Super Nelson. ⁣
Possible delivery delays of up to 7 working days - 24hr delivery service from your beers leaving the brewery, not from placing your order. Please ensure your delivery details are correct at checkout.
Orders placed after 2PM Thur will be dispatched the following week.
